title: Omega Bear's Secret
description: My first crush… my first love. Have I lost my Omega Shifter for good this time?Sarah-MaeI should never have lied to my mother about being engaged.Now my brother’s best friend thinks I am spoken for.But he is the only one for me…always has been and always will be.Now I find myself caught in the middle of a dangerous world of lies, murder and true love.Will he believe the truth now, can he forgive me?Will he protect me and our baby against the Bear Shifter who killed his father?JayMy father’s murderer is still out there.I need to protect Sarah-Mae at any cost.Even if she didn’t tell me she and is engaged to another man?!?Engaged or not I lose control when I’m around her.I can’t stop thinking about her. I need her to be mine.Will she be my true mate forever?I have lost my father…I refuse to lose her too.Steamy Shifter Scenes Inside ~ 18+
author: Scarlett Ray
